plot: Lady Macbeth is a twisted tale of seduction and domination, based around a speech from Macbeth and focusing on a young girls struggle to keep her family together at any cost.
title: Lady Macbeth
plot_es: Lady Macbeth is a twisted tale of seduction and domination, based around a speech from Macbeth and focusing on a young girls struggle to keep her family together at any cost.
plot_en: Lady Macbeth is a twisted tale of seduction and domination, based around a speech from Macbeth and focusing on a young girls struggle to keep her family together at any cost.
